text: Konstantin Dzhelepov (, born 21 April 1950) is a Bulgarian fencer. He competed in the individual and team sabre events at the 1976 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Bulgaria Category:Fencers at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Bulgarian sabre fencers
title: Konstantin Dzhelepov
